brief_description: T cell human Immune Signature of Dengue infection was studied
brief_title: Human Immune Signature of Dengue virus infection- Gene Expression of CD4 subsets
description: The human Immune Signature of Dengue virus infection was studied in two endemic areas. T cell responses were compared in infected patients and uninfected individuals also from Dengue endemic areas.
endpoints: Compare T cell response of primary and secondary Dengue virus infection by flow cytometry and RNA sequencing
hypothesis: Compare T cell response of Dengue infected patients with non-infected individuals
objectives: To determine the T cell immune signature of Dengue virus infection
official_title: Human immune signatures of Dengue virus and Mycobacterium Tuberculosis exposure in infection - Gene Expression of CD4 subsets.

arm.description: Patients previously infected with one strain of Dengue virus from the Dengue dendemic area Sri Lanka
arm.name: DENV infected patients post primary infection-Sri Lanka

arm.name: DENV infected patients post secondary infections-Sri Lanka

arm.description: Patients previously infected with two or more strains of Dengue virus from the Dengue dendemic area Nicaragua
arm.name: DENV infected patients post secondary infections-Nicaragua

arm.description: Individuals from Dengue endemic area Sri Lanka who have not been infected by Dengue virus
arm.name: Non-DENV infected individuals from DENV endemic area-Sri Lanka

arm.description: Individuals from non Dengue endemic area who have not been infected by Dengue virus
arm.name: Individuals from non Dengue endemic area who have not been infected by Dengue virus

arm.description: DENV endemic area individuals, unknown DENV infection status-Sri Lanka
arm.name: DENV endemic area individuals, unknown DENV infection status-Sri Lanka

arm.description: Patients newly infected with  Dengue virus, as determined by clinical evaluation, from the Dengue endemic area Sri Lanka
arm.name: Patients newly infected with  Dengue virus, as determined by clinical evaluation, from the Dengue endemic area Sri Lanka

pubmed.title: Unique phenotypes and clonal expansions of human CD4 effector memory T cells re-expressing CD45RA.
